message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing.  While $1,200,000 is a tempting offer, I believe the product's true value is closer to my initial proposal. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $1,350,000?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from $1,350,000. I'd be willing to meet you at $1,200,000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you consider my previous offer?
